entry.title: President of the Arthur Pendragon Fan Club
entry.summary:
Author: kiera_wesley

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,500Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 5

Summary: If you asked Merlin last year, last month, or even last week if he’d be caught dead at an Arthur Pendragon concert, he would have laughed himself sick. He liked concerts and he liked live music, but Arthur Pendragon wasn’t music. He was celebrity worship, capitalism, and nepotism wrapped up in a charming, fake-chivalrous, sexy little package. That pretty much made him public enemy number one in Merlin’s book. -Or-Merlin gets talked into attending an Arthur Pendragon concert, where he subsequently gets his mind (and other things) blown in Arthur’s dressing room.

entry.title: An unstable mass (of blood and foam)
entry.summary:
Author: begaydocrimes10001

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,301Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: "Well, how did you know I would..." Arthur seemed to search for the words. "React positively?" It was now Merlin’s turn to scoff. “Oh please, Arthur, you’re not as sly as you think. When I took off that my neckerchief you turned puce.” “That should be illegal." Arthur flushed red. "I shouldn’t have to see your neck.” Or, Merlin and Arthur start hooking up around the end of s1, after they’ve both, in a completely platonic way, decided the other is worth dying for. This situation is just a FWB one, not at all romantic, right? Right?(OR or; author explores Merlin's crazy fucking devotion to Arthur, and Arthur's crazy devotion to Merlin. They're so codependent.)

entry.title: A Dream of Spring
entry.summary:
Author: OnceUponBacktoTheFuture

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,324Chapters: 7/39Kudos: 5

Summary: When Camelot falls to a cruel king, Arthur and Merlin must find and rally their scattered friends to take back the kingdom. But after Arthur discovers Merlin's secret, he begins to see him differently. Can Arthur accept who they both are, or will they get lost in this new and dangerous Camelot, crawling with nightmares and daydreams, old friends and new enemies?

entry.title: Suddenly, your love
entry.summary:
Author: thelastpendragon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,148Chapters: 5/16Kudos: 296

Summary: “Good evening, my love! What kept you so long?” Arthur greeted him warmly as soon as he walked into the room. “Your what now?!” Merlin blurted out wide-eyed. Surely he couldn't have heard that right. But Arthur was unfazed by his apparent confusion and promptly planted a kiss on his lips as if it was the most natural thing in the world for him to do. Merlin accidentally stumbles into a timeline where Arthur seems to think he is his lover, and a very affectionate one at that. Now he just has to figure out how he got there, how can he get back to his own time and why Arthur keeps thinking about poetry.But little does he know that in this world he is a noble too and they are to be married within a month...Or: Arthur is not emotionally constipated and Merlin doesn’t know how to deal with that.

entry.title: Ephemeral (echoes of us)
entry.summary:
Author: gigiLemon

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,053Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 54

Summary: A magical trap Arthur runs into sends him hurtling into a world that looks exactly like his own. With one teeny exception; there is no one. Not a single soul.It is just him and all of empty Camelot, all by his lonesome self. All he has to do is figure out a way to break the enchantment.Oh, and bloody Merlin’s there too.-OR-Arthur and Merlin are stuck together until they find a way to break the enchantment and return home. entry.title: carved my name wrong on that gravestone (you don't even know my date of birth)
entry.summary:
Author: deniigiq

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 34,330Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 136

Summary: “Arthur, listen to me,” Merlin says suddenly in a tone so gentle that Arthur forgets what he was about to say right then and there.“I’m—I’m listening,” he says.Merlin lifts his head from his nest of arms and passes a thumb over the scab forming in the very center of his lower lip.“I fucking hate you,” he says.(Arthur accidentally reveals Merlin's magic to the world, then accidentally bonds them together before he's king, thereby throwing their prophecy way off course. He tries to make it up to Merlin by making a place for him in Camelot, but that proves to be far more complicated than he can manage on his own. Meanwhile, Merlin finds a smartphone in a wishing well and tries to electrocute a paramedic.)

entry.title: hot trash for 1484 years and counting
entry.summary:
Author: heartofgold_22

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,199Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 34

Summary: In a modern world with modern magic, one Merlin Emrys is going about his long, immortal life. He dreams in bright, vivid colours and trusts his magic. And he waits for the sea change that will preface Arthur’s return.But then a giant lizard appears out of the sewers. And several goblins rob a bank. And a troll impersonates the Prime Minister. And suddenly the world changes.Madness comes from within, and delusions of immortality are not uncommon. Maybe this is the end. It is probably the beginning.

entry.title: Gave me a Key and Called it Home (Hogwarts is my home)
entry.summary:
Author: MalfunctioningMentallyUnstableBookworm

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 51,583Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 3

Summary: Harry Potter had never made friends at school. But when a boy showed up in his class in fourth grade on the second to last day of school, who hid his bruises the same as he did, Harry wanted a friend. Nathaniel Wesninski had run with his mother away from his father. He was placed in a school in Little Whinging while his mother figured out what they were gonna do. When they both get chosen to play on the Hogwarts Foxes, the all school quidditch team that competes with other schools the boys become friends. So naturally when shit goes down and Harry can protect them he does, which lands them in the 1940s.

entry.title: Midnight Fire; The Last Dragonlord
entry.summary:
Author: NightimeCoyote

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,654Chapters: 21/40Kudos: 143

Summary: After Camleot is overrun by Morgause's army and Morgana is revealed to be a spy, Merlin is forced to free The Great Dragon. He gives him the answer he seeks yet takes something much larger, when the citadel is weak he kills Uther Pendragon.Arthur, overcome with loss, begins searching for the only man who can help him defeat The Great Dragon, the last Dragonlord. What they find, however, is much more than either Merlin or Arthur expected. In the shadow of that cruel night, Merlin must face the truth of his heritage and hide it from his best friend, the new king of Camelot.

entry.title: The Dragon Knight and the Dragonlord
entry.summary:
Author: TheRailroadWarlock

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,299Chapters: 3/5Kudos: 28

Summary: Uther abandons Arthur at birth. He remains in Tintagel and is raised by a good Nimueh and educated by Catha warriors. The forgotten prince becomes a talented fighter, but he remains lonely and unloved. He is kind and noble, and without Uther's influence he never becomes a prat. A new prophecy emerges, one that still involves Emrys. Once of age, Arthur leaves Tintagel and joins with Emrys; together, they discover their shared destiny. This story is more about character than action; it is about finding true love.
